pr_title: Fixed the video outline in the theodul player

timeline.message: Fixed the video outline in the theodul player

timeline.bodyText: I'm not very familiar with the code but this does not seem to be related to the issue you describe. This controls the overall height, doesn't it? Should this be removed?
timeline.author: lkiesow

replies.bodyText: I removed this part, because it cut off a small part of the video area on the bottom side. After removing this, the video sizes were still correct. I tested different video resolutions and ratios, single and dual videos and used Firefox and Chrome. It seems to work so far.
replies.author: marwyg
